title: Clinical Research Associate 2 (R1033515)
description:
Join us on our exciting journey! IQVIA™ is The Human Data Science Company™, focused on using data and science to help healthcare clients find better solutions for their patients. Formed through the merger of IMS Health and Quintiles, IQVIA offers a broad range of solutions that harness advances in healthcare information, technology, analytics and human ingenuity to drive healthcare forward.
PURPOSEPerform site selection (if applicable), initiation, monitoring and close-out visits in accordance with contracted scope of work and good clinical practice. If applicable, Clinical Research Associates may be accountable for development of project subject recruitment plan on a per site basis. Support work with sites to adapt, drive and track subject recruitment plan in line with project needs to enhance predictability.
RESPONSIBILITIES

Perform site selection (if applicable), initiation, monitoring and close-out visits in accordance with contracted scope of work and good clinical practice.
If applicable, may be accountable for supporting development of project subject recruitment plan on a per site basis. Work with sites to adapt, drive and track subject recruitment plan in line with project needs to enhance predictability.
Provide monitoring visits and site management for a variety of protocols, sites and therapeutic areas.
Administer protocol and related study training to assigned sites and establish regular lines of communication with sites to manage ongoing project expectations and issues.
Evaluate the quality and integrity of study site practices related to the proper conduct of the protocol and adherence to applicable regulations. Escalate quality issues as appropriate. Manage the progress of assigned studies by tracking regulatory submissions and approvals, recruitment and enrollment, case report form (CRF) completion and submission, and data query generation and resolution. May support start-up phase.
Create and maintain appropriate documentation regarding site management, monitoring visit findings and action plans by submitting regular visit reports, generating follow-up letters and other required study documentation.
Build awareness of features and opportunities of study to site.
Collaborate and liaise with study team members for project execution support as appropriate.

REQUIRED KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND ABILITIES
Basic knowledge of, and skill in applying, applicable clinical research regulatory requirements; i.e., Good Clinical Practice (GCP) and International Conference on Harmonization (ICH) guidelines
Good therapeutic and protocol knowledge as provided in company training
Computer skills including proficiency in use of Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint and use of a lap top computer
Good written and verbal communication skills including good command of English language
Good organizational and problem-solving skills
Effective time management skills
Ability to establish and maintain effective working relationships with coworkers, managers and clients

We know that meaningful results require not only the right approach but also the right people. Regardless of your role, we invite you to reimagine healthcare with us. You will have the opportunity to play an important part in helping our clients drive healthcare forward and ultimately improve human health outcomes. Whatever your career goals, we are here to ensure you get there! We invite you to join IQVIA™
Job ID: R1033515

title: JOB DESCRIPTION – ADMISSIONS CUM PATHWAY MANAGER
description:
Mô tả công việc
 

 ABOUT VIN UNIVERSITY 
VinUniversity is a newly developed, private, non-profit university in Hanoi, Vietnam. It was established by Vingroup with a mission to be the first world-class, internationally accredited and ranked university in Vietnam. VinUniversity has two overarching goals: to excel in teaching; and to produce graduates and research that contribute to developing the key economic sectors of Vietnam.The formation of the VinUniversity Project has resulted from the collaboration of Vingroup with Cornell University and the University of Pennsylvania. Cornell provides academic consulting on Management, Engineering and Technology; and Penn focuses on the Health Sciences disciplines. Both Cornell University and the University of Pennsylvania are distinguished Ivy League institutions based in the United States of America. Cornell is involved in every aspect of the development of VinUniversity from infrastructure and campus planning to curriculum development and faculty hiring. Cornell’s SC Johnson College of Business is providing extensive academic advisement in a variety of areas, drawing from a wealth of faculty expertise at multiple colleges and units at Cornell University. Penn’s medical and nursing schools are functioning in a similar fashion to guide the formation of health science education at VinUniversity and to interface with Vinmec, Vingroup’s outstanding health system which currently encompasses 7 hospitals throughout Vietnam. VinUniversity aims to meet the QS 5-star rating standards and will include the following schools within the University: a School of Business, Hospitality, and Real Estate; a School of Engineering and Technology; a School of General Education; a forthcoming School of Health Services and Public Health; a School of Nursing; and a School of Medicine. The University will be an English Medium Instruction (EMI) institution and plans to open for the inaugural class of students in Fall 2020.On November 14, 2018, VinUni started construction on the 23 hectare area, located within the mega-urban complex of VinCity Ocean Park (Gia Lam, Hanoi). VinUni’s architecture emphasizes the harmony of neo-classic façade with modern and high-tech interior design. Professors and students will find themselves equipped with modern lecture halls and classrooms designed for most advanced teaching and learning methods.VinUniversity is seeking entrepreneurial-minded intellectual who are passionate in higher education to join our team to accelarate the formation of a truly world-class university in Vietnam.
POSITION SUMMARYAdmissions cum Pathway Manager is responsible for setting up, implementing and managing the Admissions strategy to attract and retain applicants; and conducting the research and developing curriculum framework, detailed curricula and teaching materials for Pathway Program.
This special career opportunity is dedicated for people who are passionate about and keen on making breakthrough changes in the education sector of Vietnam in order to nurture the next generations of leaders for the 21st century and beyond. REPORTING LINEReports to: Admissions cum Pathway Director
KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES1. Admissions: 
 Researches and analyses markets and the applicant pool to identify, develop and implement appropriate recruitment policies, tactics and activities to achieve enrolment goals. Develops, organizes and conducts large-scale, multi-faceted recruiting events in-person and online.  Initiates and completes one-on-one advising sessions and follow-up sessions on the features and benefits of the programs to attract high-calibre applicants and students.  Assesses the effectiveness of recruitment activities and makes strategic recommendations for improvement.  Conducts mandatory admissions interviews of individuals that aid in assessing a candidates' suitability for programs.  Evaluates complex applications and documentation. Assesses academic and non-academic factors pertaining to the evaluation and admission of domestic and international applicants.  Participates in the admissions decision for candidates by reviewing files and contributing as members of the admissions committee. Assesses candidates for scholarship consideration.  Monitors and ensures consistent application of VinUni policies regarding admission assessment of both domestic and international applicants.  Makes recommendations and implements improvements to increase yield rates. Analyzes admissions survey results.  Analyzes data in order to assess the admission criteria suitability; reviews and recommends changes to admission policies, procedures and rubrics in order to achieve goals.  Designs and implements all yield activities to ensure admitted students attend programs. 
2. Pathway Program: 
 Develop and propose standards, procedures and guidelines related to the development and management of curriculum Develop the curriculum framework, detailed curriculum and teaching materials Coordinate the review and validation of curriculum and teaching materials Carry out research and produce publications, or other research outputs Give lectures and gain industrial experience in accordance with the programs of VinUni and its partners Build and maintain the collaboration with partners; organise workshops and researches both national and international. Other assigned duties by the line manager.
 



 Yêu cầu
 

 KEY SELECTION CRITERIA A Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business, administration or related field is required. Studying abroad, in an English speaking country, is an advantage At least 3, ideally 5+ years of project management experience in admissions required, with proven track record of hitting ambitious goals  Ability to inspire and mobilize others through spoken/written communications, ideally with experience managing volunteers and/or delivering presentations or trainings Track record of initiating and implementing process improvements, ideally with experience in quality improvement, change management, and/or human centered design methodology Commitment to equity and inclusion required, including experience working across areas of difference, e.g. cultural backgrounds, functional area, race/ethnicity, and/or geographic location Experience working with a relational database preferred Excellent in Vietnamese and English Master a coherent, progressive and creative thinking; to have a spirit and passion for education; to be able to take prompt actions with determination and be ready to take on new challenges. Demonstrate DNA of VinUni: Integrity, Inspiration, Impact, Innovation and Integration
ENGLISH PROFICIENCYEnglish is the language of teaching and communication at Vin University. For this role, the minimum requirement is IELTS (Academic) with a score of at least 7.0.For Higher Education roles, English Language Proficiency may also be proven by having completed PhD studies while being instructed through the medium of English.

title: Program Officer (Vingroup grant/scholarship program)
description:
Mô tả công việc
 

 ABOUT VIN UNIVERSITY 
VinUniversity is a newly developed, private, non-profit university in Hanoi, Vietnam. It was established by Vingroup with a mission to be the first world-class, internationally accredited and ranked university in Vietnam. VinUniversity has two overarching goals: to excel in teaching; and to produce graduates and research that contribute to developing the key economic sectors of Vietnam.The formation of the VinUniversity Project has resulted from the collaboration of Vingroup with Cornell University and the University of Pennsylvania. Cornell provides academic consulting on Management, Engineering and Technology; and Penn focuses on the Health Sciences disciplines. Both Cornell University and the University of Pennsylvania are distinguished Ivy League institutions based in the United States of America. Cornell is involved in every aspect of the development of VinUniversity from infrastructure and campus planning to curriculum development and faculty hiring. Cornell’s SC Johnson College of Business is providing extensive academic advisement in a variety of areas, drawing from a wealth of faculty expertise at multiple colleges and units at Cornell University. Penn’s medical and nursing schools are functioning in a similar fashion to guide the formation of health science education at VinUniversity and to interface with Vinmec, Vingroup’s outstanding health system which currently encompasses 7 hospitals throughout Vietnam. VinUniversity aims to meet the QS 5-star rating standards and will include the following schools within the University: a School of Business, Hospitality, and Real Estate; a School of Engineering and Technology; a School of General Education; a forthcoming School of Health Services and Public Health; a School of Nursing; and a School of Medicine. The University will be an English Medium Instruction (EMI) institution and plans to open for the inaugural class of students in Fall 2020.On November 14, 2018, VinUni started construction on the 23 hectare area, located within the mega-urban complex of VinCity Ocean Park (Gia Lam, Hanoi). VinUni’s architecture emphasizes the harmony of neo-classic façade with modern and high-tech interior design. Professors and students will find themselves equipped with modern lecture halls and classrooms designed for most advanced teaching and learning methods.VinUniversity is seeking entrepreneurial-minded intellectual who are passionate in higher education to join our team to accelarate the formation of a truly world-class university in Vietnam.
POSITION SUMMARYThe Program Officer is an integral member of Vingroup grant/scholarship programs. He/She will be in charge of implementing all activities related to the development and execution of Vingroup grant/scholarship programs including the STEM program for Vietnamese high schools, STEMME500 and YAT50. This special career opportunity is dedicated for people who are passionate about and keen on making breakthrough changes in the education sector of Vietnam in order to nurture the next generations of leaders for the 21st century and beyond. 
REPORTING LINEReports to: The Program Manager
KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES• Arrange, prepare logistics, schedule, agendas, and documentation for the programs;• Create, maintain, revise, and update announcements, documents, forms, and records for the programs;• Prepare reports, publications for the programs and other data related to the programs.• Respond to oral and written inquiries from the applicants, awardees and stake-holders for the programs.• Take part in events and activities of the programs including, but not limited to the following: (1) screening applications; (2) organizing the oral exam orientations; (3) arranging logistics for the interviews; (4) organizing the university application orientations; (5) assisting with details related to the university application process; (6) checking admission results to foreign universities; and (7) arranging logistics for the pre-departure orientation; • Assist with outreach activities to promote the programs’ image and reputation.• Assure that all current awardees complete all details of reporting their full-time status and academic performance each semester, each academic year. Follow up and follow through with the awardees and host universities to keep track of grantee’s academic and training status• Coordinate with host universities on issues related to academic/training performance• Other assigned duties by the line manager
 



 Yêu cầu
 

 KEY SELECTION CRITERIA• Have experience in an international development organization, non-profit agency, Vietnamese university, international education organization,…. with minimum of 3 years working experience in related field is preferred.• A Bachelor’s degree in Education, English, development studies, a field related to international relations or related field is required. Studying abroad, in an English speaking country, is an advantage.• Good knowledge of the Vietnamese and international systems of higher education. Knowledge also about resources for science and technology is desirable.• Experience working with diverse populations and ability to communicate well in cross-cultural situations.• Overseas experience is preferred through studying, living, or working in an English-speaking country.• Ability to manage logistics and details of several major projects at once• Excellent in Vietnamese and English• Master a coherent, progressive and creative thinking; to have a spirit and passion for education; to be able to take prompt actions with determination and be ready to take on new challenges.• Ability and availability to travel in-country and internationally as required.• Demonstrate DNA of VinUni: Integrity, Inspiration, Impact, Innovation and Integration
ENGLISH PROFICIENCYEnglish is the language of teaching and communication at Vin University. For this role, the minimum requirement is IELTS (Academic) with a score of at least 7.0.For Higher Education roles, English Language Proficiency may also be proven by having completed PhD studies while being instructed through the medium of English.

title: Program Manager (Vingroup grant/scholarship program)
description:
Mô tả công việc
 

 ABOUT VIN UNIVERSITY 
VinUniversity is a newly developed, private, non-profit university in Hanoi, Vietnam. It was established by Vingroup with a mission to be the first world-class, internationally accredited and ranked university in Vietnam. VinUniversity has two overarching goals: to excel in teaching; and to produce graduates and research that contribute to developing the key economic sectors of Vietnam.The formation of the VinUniversity Project has resulted from the collaboration of Vingroup with Cornell University and the University of Pennsylvania. Cornell provides academic consulting on Management, Engineering and Technology; and Penn focuses on the Health Sciences disciplines. Both Cornell University and the University of Pennsylvania are distinguished Ivy League institutions based in the United States of America. Cornell is involved in every aspect of the development of VinUniversity from infrastructure and campus planning to curriculum development and faculty hiring. Cornell’s SC Johnson College of Business is providing extensive academic advisement in a variety of areas, drawing from a wealth of faculty expertise at multiple colleges and units at Cornell University. Penn’s medical and nursing schools are functioning in a similar fashion to guide the formation of health science education at VinUniversity and to interface with Vinmec, Vingroup’s outstanding health system which currently encompasses 7 hospitals throughout Vietnam. VinUniversity aims to meet the QS 5-star rating standards and will include the following schools within the University: a School of Business, Hospitality, and Real Estate; a School of Engineering and Technology; a School of General Education; a forthcoming School of Health Services and Public Health; a School of Nursing; and a School of Medicine. The University will be an English Medium Instruction (EMI) institution and plans to open for the inaugural class of students in Fall 2020.On November 14, 2018, VinUni started construction on the 23 hectare area, located within the mega-urban complex of VinCity Ocean Park (Gia Lam, Hanoi). VinUni’s architecture emphasizes the harmony of neo-classic façade with modern and high-tech interior design. Professors and students will find themselves equipped with modern lecture halls and classrooms designed for most advanced teaching and learning methods.VinUniversity is seeking entrepreneurial-minded intellectual who are passionate in higher education to join our team to accelarate the formation of a truly world-class university in Vietnam.
POSITION SUMMARYFirstly, The Program Manager will manage all activities relating to the development and execution of Vingroup grant programs including the STEM program for Vietnamese high schools, STEMME500 and YAT50. Secondly, The Program Manager will coordinate with Vietnamese universities and research institutes, educational organizations, diplomatic missions in Vietnam, and foreign host universities for the recruitment, application, admission and program implementation. Thirdly, The Program Manager maintains constant vigil on details of Vingroup grant programs, initiate and develop processes for successful outcomes. Importantly, she/he must ensure quality in all activities, reflecting the high standards of Vingroup.This special career opportunity is dedicated for people who are passionate about and keen on making breakthrough changes in the education sector of Vietnam in order to nurture the next generations of leaders for the 21st century and beyond. 
REPORTING LINEReports to: The Operation Director
KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES1. Oversee and manage the organization of major grant/scholarship events and activities in Vietnam• The promotion campaigns of the grant/scholarship programs• The outreach/recruitment campaigns of the programs• The application processes of the applicants including applying for Vingroup grants and the university application process• The Pre-Departure Orientation (PDO) programs for new cohort of awardees • The departure preparation for the new awardees• The Alumni activities to welcome returning awardees.
2. Manage all aspects of Vingroup grant/scholarship programs from application through completion of academic and training programs in the foreign host universities as well as in Vietnam• Oversee the application process• Oversee and assist Vingroup grant application in their application process to foreign universities and coordinate with the host universities• Manage the health checkups for the awardees prior to their departure • Manage the issuance and collection of grant letters for new awardees• Oversee the international travel arrangements for the awardees• Oversee the academic/training performance reporting procedure of the awardees.
3. Provide strategic inputs and initiatives for the operation and implementation of Vingroup grant/scholarship programs
4. Manage the administrative and logistic operations of Vingroup grant/scholarship programs• Respond to oral and written inquiries from Vietnam, and as appropriate from the foreign host universities, regarding Vingroup grants/scholarship programs• Communicate procedures clearly and makes timely and complete announcements• Work closely with foreign host universities/institutes, building positive relationships and clarifying expectations and program details• Provide input for the program budgets • Create and maintain updated documents and forms for, and records of, the programs, including summaries and evaluations as well as contact information for applicants, program participants, and host universities• Create and maintain all related online forms to obtain data for reporting purposes.• Other assigned duties by the line manager
 



 Yêu cầu
 

 KEY SELECTION CRITERIA• Have experience in an international development organization, non-profit agency, Vietnamese university, international education organization, …. with minimum of 5 years working experience in related field is preferred.• A Bachelor’s degree in Education, English, library and information science/management, science education or management, a field related to international relations or related field is required. Studying abroad, in an English speaking country, is an advantage.• Good knowledge of the Vietnamese and international systems of higher education. Knowledge also about resources for science and technology is desirable.• Experience working with diverse populations and ability to communicate well in cross-cultural situations.• Overseas experience is preferred through studying, living, or working in an English-speaking country.• Ability to build and maintain relationships with foreign and Vietnamese government agencies and institutions as well as high-level government officials and scientists.• Excellent in Vietnamese and English• Master a coherent, progressive and creative thinking; to have a spirit and passion for education; to be able to take prompt actions with determination and be ready to take on new challenges.• Ability and availability to travel in-country and internationally as required.• Demonstrate DNA of VinUni: Integrity, Inspiration, Impact, Innovation and Integration
ENGLISH PROFICIENCYEnglish is the language of teaching and communication at Vin University. For this role, the minimum requirement is IELTS (Academic) with a score of at least 7.0.For Higher Education roles, English Language Proficiency may also be proven by having completed PhD studies while being instructed through the medium of English.

title: Director of General Education Program
description:
Mô tả công việc
 

 ABOUT VIN UNIVERSITY 
VinUniversity is a newly developed, private, non-profit university in Hanoi, Vietnam. It was established by Vingroup with a mission to be the first world-class, internationally accredited and ranked university in Vietnam. VinUniversity has two overarching goals: to excel in teaching; and to produce graduates and research that contribute to developing the key economic sectors of Vietnam.The formation of the VinUniversity Project has resulted from the collaboration of Vingroup with Cornell University and the University of Pennsylvania. Cornell provides academic consulting on Management, Engineering and Technology; and Penn focuses on the Health Sciences disciplines. Both Cornell University and the University of Pennsylvania are distinguished Ivy League institutions based in the United States of America. Cornell is involved in every aspect of the development of VinUniversity from infrastructure and campus planning to curriculum development and faculty hiring. Cornell’s SC Johnson College of Business is providing extensive academic advisement in a variety of areas, drawing from a wealth of faculty expertise at multiple colleges and units at Cornell University. Penn’s medical and nursing schools are functioning in a similar fashion to guide the formation of health science education at VinUniversity and to interface with Vinmec, Vingroup’s outstanding health system which currently encompasses 7 hospitals throughout Vietnam. VinUniversity aims to meet the QS 5-star rating standards and will include the following schools within the University: a School of Business, Hospitality, and Real Estate; a School of Engineering and Technology; a School of General Education; a forthcoming School of Health Services and Public Health; a School of Nursing; and a School of Medicine. The University will be an English Medium Instruction (EMI) institution and plans to open for the inaugural class of students in Fall 2020.On November 14, 2018, VinUni started construction on the 23 hectare area, located within the mega-urban complex of VinCity Ocean Park (Gia Lam, Hanoi). VinUni’s architecture emphasizes the harmony of neo-classic façade with modern and high-tech interior design. Professors and students will find themselves equipped with modern lecture halls and classrooms designed for most advanced teaching and learning methods.With a strong commitment from Vingroup, Vinmec and VinUni project in particular has been fortunate to receive generous financial investment. VinUni wants to be a national leader in health sciences education quality in Vietnam with regard to MD, Residency and Nursing programs. It aims for its graduates to have the foundations to become quality care providers and leaders in developing a health care system equal to any other. Nursing graduates will demonstrate internationally aligned competency in practice and become the role model for the era of a new nurse with a focus on working equally in health care teams to provide seamless patient care services, evidence based clinical care using a person centred philosophy. 
POSITION SUMMARY
This is currently a unique opportunity to join and contribute to the growing research and education program in the up-coming VinUniversity in 2019. The successful candidate will have a strong track record of leadership in higher education curriculum design, development and implementation in the University sector in the area of general education. This position is a full-time faculty appointment with a competitive start-up package. VinUni and Vingroup offers an excellent remuneration package with various benefits of a leading private business corporation in Vietnam. More importantly, this is a great career opportunity for those academic leaders who want to pursuit a meaningful journey to improve the quality of health care service and education reform with great impact on one of the largest populations in Asia. 
Faculty rank and salary package will be commensurate with qualifications, regardless of gender, ethnicity, countries of origin, or religious background. REPORTING LINEReports to: Director of Business Management and General Education 
KEY ACCOUNTABILITIESProgram Development for General Education
 The successful candidate is expected to take lead and responsibility for the development and implementation of all curriculum for general education. Provide leadership on course development, curriculum development and implementation, course quality assurance and improvement, and professional accreditation for general education program at VinUni. Provide leadership at course levels for implementation of teaching and learning priorities such as project based education, student centered learning, teacher appraisal and articulation to degreed programs. Promote the development of active teaching and learning practices in the delivery of the course ensuring integration of graduate attributes and competency standards across the course. Develop and monitor efforts to continuously improve the course and report to steering committee on course progression, course improvement projects, key performance indicators and other relevant evaluation data  Facilitate working relationships on teaching and learning matters with others academic faculties and supporting offices across VinUni Manage and oversee budgets for strategic funds allocated to course development and implementation. Contribute to the university teaching and learning plan. During the project phase: The candidate will report to the Project Director, Director of Business Management and General Education. Closely coordinate with Deans of schools and Head of Student Affairs to design and implement students’ experiential learning.
Human Resource Development for General Education; mentoring/ teaching role: The candidate is also expected to maintain leadership and mentorship capability in advising VinUni members within his/ her area of expertise. The candidate is expected to teach in his/her area of expertise to VinUni members, and later on VinUni students. The candidate is expected to serve as an advisor and supervise the research of undergraduate students.  Work with the VinUni leaderboard to develop a profile of suitable candidates to teach in the course and participate in selection committees for position appointments Develop learning and teaching committees within the General Education and participate as a member for other relevant committees (upon request from the VinUni leaderboard) Prepare a plan for performance appraisal of faculty of General Education faculty and staff on a yearly basis.
 



 Yêu cầu
 

 KEY SELECTION CRITERIA PhD degree or equivalent. Strong track record in higher education program development and implementation with international standard and accreditation. Experienced in higher education pedagogy as well as teaching at least one subject in the area of general education. Excellent written and verbal communication skill in English.  Excellent interpersonal skills in academic setting.  Verbal communication skill in Vietnamese is a plus. Experience in coaching / mentoring educators. Experience of working in multidisciplinary and collaborative educational team.
ENGLISH PROFICIENCYEnglish is the language of teaching and communication at Vin University. For this role, the minimum requirement is IELTS (Academic) with a score of at least 7.0.For Higher Education roles, English Language Proficiency may also be proven by having completed PhD studies while being instructed through the medium of English.
WORK PERMITAll foreign employees must adhere to the requirements for obtaining a valid visa and work permit in Vietnam. These requirements are mandated by the Government and may be over and above the mandatory requirements and key selection criteria. Work permit requirements are subject to change.Vin University accepts zero tolerance to non-adherence of the immigration laws of Vietnam.

title: QC Manager
description:
Job summary
A well established furniture manufacturer in Vietnam Job Responsibilities

Establish quality procedures, standards, and specifications for a company
Collaborate with an organization’s purchasing manager to ensure raw materials from external suppliers meet quality requirements
Set and enforce standards for health and safety during work operations
Ensure manufacturing processes are in compliance with both national and international standards of production
Conduct surveys to identify customer requirements and ensure they are being met by established quality standards
Proffer recommendations to company management on ways to improve on existing quality processes
Collect, compile, and analyze relevant quality statistical data to obtain information regarding quality performance
Supervise technicians, inspectors, and other company staff to ensure they perform their duties in line with established quality procedures
Monitor product development processes to identify deviations from quality policies
Conduct tests to verify the quality of raw materials and finished products
Review existing process and product specification to identify the need for improvement or upgrade
Approve compliant products and reject defective ones
Prepare and present reports to update upper management on quality activities
Maintain proper records of quality test, procedures and standards.

Experience requirements

Education and Training: To become a quality assurance manager, you require a Bachelor’s degree in business management or administration. Some quality manager jobs may require industry-specific disciplines such as engineering, polymer science technology, and applied sciences. Most quality managers advance in their careers from lower positions, thus have prior experience as a quality officer or technologist
Analytical Skill: Quality control managers are able to conduct tests to ensure a product or material falls within established quality specification
Interpersonal Skill: They are able to work with team of quality assurance personnel to make sure raw materials and final products meet set standards of quality
 Education requirements
Bachelor Degree Contact Person

  Liem Duong
 Adecco

title: Principal Fullstack Engineer/Hacker
company: Bài việt không đề cập tên Công ty
description:
The Job


Havaz là một sản phẩm công nghệ mới đột phá được thiết kế để thay đổi cách thức di chuyển của hành khách cũng như vận chuyển hàng hóa đường dài liên tỉnh. Bằng cách tạo ra một hệ sinh thái kết nối hành khách có nhu cầu di chuyển với các đơn vị vận tải, chúng tôi có thể tối ưu hóa cung đường di chuyển, rút ngắn thời gian di chuyển và thời gian chờ đợi. Được sự hậu thuẫn từ công ty mẹ Hải Vân là công ty vận tải hàng đầu Việt Nam với kinh nghiệm trên 20 năm hoạt động trong lĩnh vực vận tải, kết hợp với sự dẫn dắt của những founder nhiều kinh nghiệm chinh chiến startup công nghệ, Havaz đã và đang đạt được những bước phát triển vững chắc. Chúng tôi tự tin đang ở trên một đường đua khá tốt và một thị trường đầy tiềm năng bởi vậy chúng tôi mong muốn tìm kiếm những người đồng hành mới để chinh phục các thử thách phía trước.
Một số điều bạn cần biết về Havaz:
Sản phẩm của chúng tôi phục vụ người dân Việt Nam, khách hàng của chúng tôi chính là bạn và những người như bạn có nhu cầu di chuyển từ A đến B. Tuy nhiên mục tiêu của chúng tôi luôn là xây dựng một cái gì đó cho thị trường khu vực Đông Nam Á và Châu Á.
Havaz là một công ty sản phẩm, không phải là một công ty gia công. Điều đó có nghĩa là chúng ta không phải lúc nào cũng có một danh sách hoàn hảo các yêu cầu để biết chính xác phải làm gì tiếp theo và chúng ta cần phải làm việc cùng nhau để tìm ra nó.
Havaz là một công ty sản phẩm. Thiết kế rất quan trọng, đó là một cái gì đó cần phải có ngay từ ngày đầu, không phải thứ bạn cố gắng thêm vào sau ba hoặc bốn năm. Trải nghiệm người dùng rất quan trọng. Làm một sản phẩm để khách hàng thực sự thích sử dụng là rất quan trọng. Đặt khách hàng làm trung tâm là con đường Havaz theo đuổi
Mô tả công việc
Là một Kỹ sư cấp cao thành viên của core team, người có tài năng giải quyết các vấn đề kiến trúc và kỹ thuật phức tạp, bạn sẽ giúp chúng tôi định hình kiến ​​trúc của hệ thống. Khi làm như vậy, bạn sẽ phải đối mặt với rất nhiều thách thức mà bạn có thể không có cơ hội đối mặt ở bất kỳ công ty nào khác.
Bạn là người kỹ tính, cẩn thận và để ý chi tiết, xem xét các vấn đề từ các hướng khác nhau để đưa ra các giải pháp kỹ thuật tốt nhất. Là một Kỹ sư cấp cao, bạn không gặp vấn đề gì trong việc hướng dẫn và tư vấn cho các cộng sự cấp dưới để họ hoàn thành công việc tốt nhất.
Bạn có tư duy và kỹ năng của một hacker. Luôn tìm tòi, hack mọi thứ ở các khía cạnh khác nhau để tìm ra giải pháp độc đáo cho những vấn đề học búa



Your Skills and Experience


7+ years of experience in software engineering, building and hacking thing
Having a hacker mindset and philosophy http://paulgraham.com/gh.html
You have a track record of building and deploying complex software
You can adapt to different programming languages and technologies.
You have made tough technical decisions based on requirements, trade-offs, and user experience.
You enjoy building and growing strong A-player team
You are comfortable with a lot of autonomy.
Background in Distributed systems, Data Science or AI is a plus
Enforce engineering best practices
Implement CD/CI, TDD, end-to-end test architecture

Core Technologies Used
Very strong in at least one or several of these core tech:
Node.js, Golang, Laravel, Erlang, Python, C/C++
React.js, Vue.js, React Native, Swift/ObjectiveC, Kotlin/Java
Kubernetes, Kafka, Spark, Elasticsearch, Message Broker (NATS, RabbitMQ, MQTT…)
High performance messaging using Protobuf
AWS services (EC2, S3, Lamda, SQS...), Google Cloud Services, Firebase
The best would be 7+ years of professional experience, a big plus if you've lead a team or created a great product. We welcome strong candidate having fewer years of experience as well, please tell us why "year" doesn't matter to you in the application letter. We have a hacker culture and mindset which value intellectual challenge of creatively overcoming limitations of software systems to achieve novel and clever outcomes http://paulgraham.com/gh.html.
Have a very strong technical skill, as a high ranking Principal Engineer/Hacker, member of the Core Team, we do expect any team members to be very strong in one of these core tech: React.js, React Native, Node.js, Golang, Laravel, Erlang, Python, C/C++. You may breathe React and NodeJs ecosystem but you can switch to Python or Golang easily. You can adapt easily and comfortable working on new technology when required because new technology or language are just one of many tools in your tool set. You are open mind self motivation and constantly learning new technology. You know exactly what you are talking about and people 100% trust you on your talk.
Have a strong architecture skill, stands on your own, makes and protects your own architecture decisions.
Have an open mind, can-but-not-blindly-do attitude. You have "can-do" attitude, which is already very cool, but you also must be able to pause and ask "should we do it"
Understand the balance between technical and business decisions
Understand the value of writing test
Be on your own, dedicated and committed, we strongly believe in autonomous, there's likely no one to tell you what to do
And be a TEAM PLAYER, because we can move nowhere without a team
Must be able to say "I was wrong", because no one is perfect
And last but not least: Always treat people with respect



Why You'll Love Working Here



Competitive salary. We pay what you deserve, not what the paper says

Big chance to grow as a person, we'll move fast, you'll soon realize that you have to make a lot of decisions on your own

Even bigger chance to grow as an engineer, we all open to try and apply new technology; if it doesn't work, well, we have learned

Flexible working hours. Don't let 9 to 5 limit you. You want to go to CoffeeHouse to work, fine. Want to stay home to fix exploded oven, totally cool.
Beautiful office
Health insurance, free in-office snack, coffee, Apple laptop, extra monitor etc...

• Deploy the FICO module (financial accounting)• Analyze business requirements (e.g., functional and technical requirements, information need, business processes) by conducting information-gathering sessions, analyzing the information and being able to document an accurate understanding of the business requirements and mapping of those to SAP business processes.• Design and configuration of SAP FI, CO modules• Check, control data, collate reports on FICO• Advanced: data mining, collation of reports on FICO• Seek problem, and assisting in testing process in order to discover errors and issues in daily performance, documentation or user's lack of experience, and to maintenance or upgrades.

• Work out in SAP Production Planning: possess & demonstrate detailed • Design configuration of full lifecycle implementation for SAP Production Planning and Execution • Be in charge in discrete & repetitive manufacturing; • Support in forecasting, S&OP, demand management & material requirement to the users’s lack of experiences• Seek problem, and assisting in testing process in order to discover errors and issues in daily performance, documentation or user's lack of experience, and to maintenance or upgrades.



Your Skills and Experience

- Bachelor’s Degree in Computer/Information Science/Finance & Accounting - Experience in SAP FI and CO modules (usually at least 2 - 5 years), more full life cycle implementations of SAP S/4HANA (Fiori is not must but a plus).- Experience in SAP PP modules (usually at least 2 - 5 years) in key concepts of :make to order, make tostock, MRP, capacity planning & evaluation, variant configuration, shop-floor execution & master and transactional data management.- Strong understanding business processes and requirements; leading thoughtful design discussions around meeting business needs in a standard manner fully leveraging SAP capabilities.- Good communication and consulting skills - English communication
You are appreciated to submit the detailed resume in English with contact information soon.Applications will be kept highly confidential.



Why You'll Love Working Here

title: RF Engineer
description:
NIC's Client

Job requirement:• University degree or technical college qualifications in telecommunications, electronic engineering, computer science or equivalent experience in a related discipline.• Good knowledge of the cellular system concept and Ericsson products (preferable have 3+ years experience in GSM/CDMA/WCDMA cellular system).• Detail knowledge of network performance techniques, especially in relation to cellular networks.• Independent, self-motivated, and well organised with an analytical mind.• Co-operative, open to continuous change and varying degrees of responsibility.• Excellent Team Player• Good GSM/CDMA/UMTS Technology Basic Module (UMTS is preferable)• Good Radio Compulsory Module

description:
NIC's Client 

- 
 NIC's client is the global telecommunication company.

PRINCIPAL ACCOUNTABILITES :The general tasks include:
• Perform RF network design, planning and optimization activities • Perform link budget analysis, design criteria and traffic analysis • Ensure data integrity of various morphology/topography databases and drive test data for model calibration • Carry out area and site surveys to identify RF equipment location and antenna orientation• Understand equipment co-location requirements for multiple operators • Perform inter-modulation analysis • Perform site candidate evaluation • Verify RF related site engineering drawings • Perform co-channel and adjacent channel interference testing and analysis• Perform radio network design and optimization for high capacity wireless networks using GSM, UMTS and LTE technologies. • Lead resource for routine monitoring and review of Radio Network Related Key Performance Indicators (KPI). • Support the RF teams regarding GSM/GPRS/UMTS/LTE optimization, parameter setting and performance issues. • Interface with other regional functional teams such as: RF planning, RAN engineering, In-building, and UMTS/LTE Design group. • Perform New Network Design for Green Field Operator and Network Expansion activities aligned with Presales team. • Competence/Knowledge Transfer and lead by Example.
RECOMMENDED MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS
• University degree or technical college qualifications in telecommunications, electronic engineering, computer science or equivalent experience in a related discipline.• Good knowledge of the cellular system concept and Ericsson 2G/3G/LTE products (preferable have 3+ years experience in GSM/WCDMA cellular system).• Detail knowledge of network performance techniques, especially in relation to cellular networks.• Independent, self-motivated, and well organised with an analytical mind.• Co-operative, open to continuous change and varying degrees of responsibility.• Excellent Team Player

Professional/Technical Competence- GOOD GSM/CDMA/UMTS Technology Basic Module- GOOD Radio Compulsory Module

title: Senior Game Designer (Foreigner)
description:
Job Description:New game ideas and prototyping:• Work on new game ideas, work with game designers on improving / finalizing their ideas.• Have a good knowledge on what games are on the market, what new idea could bring something new.• Transform high level ideas into accurate, intelligible, and quantified specifications.• Select ideas that would benefit from a prototype and work with the prototyping team to constantly create new prototypes.Game production:• Act as product owner for the games in production, follow up with the team and project manager on the progress and respect of defined specifications.• Make decisions on design choices and problematics that occur during production. • Oversee the game mechanics, data, economy and progression.• Constantly improve the overall creativity, inspire passion to the other team members.
Job Requirement:• Experience in the mobile game industry.• Be creative, imaginative and original.• Good knowledge of relevant game mechanisms and Mobile game market.• Strong affinity and passion for games, especially Mobile games.• Strong analytical and critical skills, know why an idea or a game is good or not and what can be changed to make it better.• Ability to rapidly create coherent design mockups.• Flexibility and ability to adapt quickly.• Ability to work well in a team environment, excellent leadership skills• Good communication and presentation skills• Native English speakers and/or foreigners with good knowledge of English, spoken and written
Advantages:• Relevant education and degree (Game Design, Computer Science, Psychology, Marketing etc.)• Previous experience working on any aspect of mobile games.• Familiarity with any creation software and and any game engine (Photoshop, any 3D software, Unity, etc).• Experience with animation systems and design• Basic understanding of programming
Benefits:• You have a chance to work on multiple games, define the roadmap of future games to create.• You have a chance to work closely with both experienced Vietnamese and foreign experts.• Company offers lunch to all members. We work 40 hours per week.• Provides attractive salary and benefits, excellent and international working environment• Salary range: $1,000 - $2,000• Be responsible for helping define, document, maintain, and communicate the complete game design, and work with artists and engineers to deliver these new titles

Mô tả công việc 














Our client is a FDI  company, now looking for a QA Automation Testing Engineer in Ha Noi:
- Development, implementation and maintenance of automation tests, data sets utilize commercial tools

- Replace existing manual inspection work with AT test.
- Increase the scope of AT inspection and reduce customer error rate.

- Proposals, contributions to improve testing and software quality.
- Research and make recommendations on new technology

- Minimum 3 years of software experience, QA
- Have at least 2 years of direct experience in the field of Software Automation.
- Proficiency in reading and writing English business, maybe when communicating in groups
- Priority for candidates who have been exposed to Selenium WebSearch, Microsoft software automation tools (Encrypted user interface, WinAppDriver)
- Understanding of core web development technologies (such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, AJAX, JSON).
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Computer Programming, Mathematics ...

title: Nhân viên triển khai ứng dụng công nghệ
description:
Nhân viên triển khai ứng dụng công nghệ | Công Ty TNHH Lykos





















 Nhân viên triển khai ứng dụng công nghệ


















Mô tả công việc 













 
 
Quản lý hệ thống phần mềm doanh nghiệp


Tìm hiểu nhu cầu quản lý và vận hành công việc tại các phòng ban trong Công ty để tư vấn cho Ban Giám đốc các phần mềm và ứng dụng công nghệ phù hợp.


Phân tích nghiệp vụ các phòng ban để thiết kế và tùy chỉnh các tính năng trên hệ thống phần mềm có sẵn theo nhu cầu từng phòng (ở mức drag-drop, không cần code/dev)


Triển khai cài đặt và hướng dẫn sử dụng cho CBNV Công ty các ứng dụng công nghệ, giải pháp phần mềm mới


Phối hợp cùng Ban Giám đốc và các cấp quản lý phân tích nghiệp vụ chuyên môn và phương thức vận hành các phòng ban trong toàn công ty.


Triển khai, hướng dẫn, duy trì, giám sát hoạt động của các ứng dụng CNTT được phân công.


Tham gia xây dựng, vận hành


2Tạo và phát triển báo cáo cung cấp thông tin cho trưởng nhóm / CEO


3. Những nội dung công việc liên quan tới phân tích dữ liệu có sẵn theo nhu cầu của trưởng nhóm.














Yêu cầu công việc















Độ tuổi: 22-25


Chuyên ngành: Kỹ sư công nghệ hoặc business


Kinh nghiệm làm BA từ 1 - 3 năm


Biết 1 chút về code như html / json


Hiểu biết về các ứng dụng


Đã sử dụng JQL và MDX -ezbi là 1 lợi thế




Sử dụng thành thạo các phần mềm tiện ích văn phòng cơ bản: word, excel...




Tiếng anh khá, có thể google/ đọc hiểu tài liệu hướng dẫn




Giao tiếp tốt, nhanh nhẹn, linh hoạt


Khả năng tương tác, làm việci tốt


Phân tích, tổng hợp, báo cáo


Tư duy tốt




Có mong muốn phát triển trong tương lại: Phân tích dữ liệu, data science,

 Lykos là tổ chức chuyên nghiệp, tiên phong trong việc phục vụ và mang lại sức khỏe, vẻ đẹp cho những người năng động để từ đó nâng cao chất lượng cuộc sống tốt hơn.Chúng tôi hiểu những áp lực và mệt mỏi trong công việc, cuộc sống của bạn. Và hơn bao giờ hết, chúng tôi cũng thấu hiểu những mong muốn có được sức khỏe tốt, cơ thể đẹp là của bất kỳ ai. Bởi vậy, tại Lykos, chúng tôi đều luôn luôn tự nỗ lực không ngừng để mang đến chương trình luyện tập KickFitness và HIIT chất lượng hàng đầu. Đó là cách hiệu quả và lành mạnh nhất để lấy lại sự sung sức, vóc dáng cân đối, cải thiện các vấn đề sức khỏe như đau mỏi lưng, vai, xương do ngồi nhiều, lười vận động, đồng thời gia tăng phản xạ linh hoạt, tự vệ bản thân.

title: Hr executive
description:
Abivin Jsc Vietnam"Abivin là công ty chuyên về lĩnh vực phân tích dữ liệu lớn và tối ưu hệ thống (Big Data Analytics & Optimization). Đây là một lĩnh vực mới và rất tiềm năng ở Việt Nam và Đông Nam Á với khách hàng là những tập đoàn lớn (Fortune 500 & Forbes Global 2000) với nhu cầu ngày càng cao.
Abvin được thành lập bởi các kỹ sư tài năng và doanh nhân kinh nghiệm có chung đam mê dùng công nghệ để thay đổi thế giới. Đội ngũ nhân sự của Abivin đã từng làm việc tại các tập đoàn lớn trên thế giới như Google, Facebook hay Microsoft và có nhiều năm kinh nghiệm trong việc xây dựng những hệ thống phần mềm thông minh.
Abivin có môi trường làm việc trẻ trung và đầy sáng tạo. Bên cạnh chế độ lương thưởng hấp dẫn, Abivin còn có chế độ ưu đãi về cổ phần đối với các thành viên tham gia đóng góp cho công ty."

title: Monitoring & Evaluation Officer
company: Bài việt không đề cập tên Công ty
description:
EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITYWITH AN INTERNATIONAL NON-GOVERNMENT ORGANIZATION (INGO)
PSI is a leading global health organization using private sector techniques to address a variety of health related issues in Vietnam including malaria, reproductive health, HIV & AIDS, sanitation & hygiene, and non-communicable diseases. PSI provides products, services and behavior change communications that improve the health and well-being of underserved communities. For more information: www.psi.org
PSI currently seeks a talented and motivated Monitoring & Evaluation Officer to work full-time with our dynamic, results-oriented team in Hanoi:
Job Title: MONITORING & EVALUATION (M&E) OFFICER
Job summary: The M&E Officer is responsible for working on under the guidance of the SI Director. She/he will spend an estimated 20% of her/his time to go to field in project provinces. The M&E Officer will contribute i) to document findings of field trips ii) to ensure MIS data system run smoothly iii) to manage and consolidate for data missing and other specific tasks required by supervisor when appropriate.
Key responsibilities:

Ensuring quality data from the activity level feeds into program management and donor reports in accordance with PSI regional and global policies, best practice and donor requirements.
Documenting findings from field monitoring trips in clear reports, consistent with PSI standards and policies including signed consent forms for pictures taken.
Monitoring and verifying data collected through phone calls and/or physical visit to PSI clients and partners
Entering data from provider monitoring forms, consolidating and analyzing the Health network quality improvement system (HNQIS), pre-and post-test results of capacity building trainings to database (DHIS2).
Analyzing and consolidating data to generate monthly malaria bulletin, monthly dashboard and other monitoring reports
Actively participating in data to action workshops and other programming and planning activities which require a good understanding data for decision-making
Translating, reviewing and supporting the writing of M&E and research materials.
Supporting the writing of reports, work plans and proposals.

Selection criteria:

University degree in social sciences, research, health or another relevant field
Minimum 2-year experience in program monitoring
Technical experience in data base manipulation, graphic data presentation, data collection...
Detail oriented and familiarity with data entry and analysis software such as EPIINFO, SPSS or STATA an added advantage.
Good in English (communication and writing)

A competitive remuneration package will be offered to the successful candidate.
Interested candidates are requested to submit detailed curriculum vitae (CV) with a letter of interest indicating the position you are applying for as well as copies ofrelevant certificates/degrees no later than 25 January 2019 to HR Department, PSI Vietnam; Address: 11th floor, VINAFOR Building, 127 Lo Duc, Hai Ba Trung, Hanoi; or through email: **@psi.org.vn or fax: (024) 3944 6***; Please do not contact via telephone. Dossier will not be returned.

Organisation Name: 
PSI 
Location: 
Hanoi 
Application Deadline: 
Fri, 2019-01-25

title: Java Team Leader (Full-stack)
company: Bài việt không đề cập tên Công ty
description:
The Job



We will consider higher (Dev Manager)/ lower (Sr. Java developer) level based on candidate's qualification.
You’ll be responsible for the complete scope, design, build and testing of products and features for one of Asia’s fastest growing fintech companies. As a part of the True Money Engineering team, you will be exposed to many innovative technologies in the fields of distributed data processing, big data, algorithms and data structures, machine learning, and experimentation. True Money is customer centric first and our mission is to empower users to experience digital life through an amazing user experience enabling pay anyone and purchase anything anywhere and anytime.
You have an appreciation of architecture and system design, love to code and enjoy seeing your work land in the hands of millions.
You’ll be involved in technical leadership, hands-on coding as well as working with design patterns, complex solution design, full life cycle service ownership, deployment, monitoring and diagnostics and much more. We are performance driven in our approach and our product is a best in class solution.  
This is a full stack role, covering everything from designing interfaces and building back-end services and APIs, to configuring build pipelines and deployment systems. We experiment and iterate to deliver the best experience for the customer.  Our platform is designed scale and multi country adoption throughout South East Asia.  With high volume use cases, it’s a chance to showcase your software and architectural skills to help revolutionize cashless transactions and the offline to online ecosystem. You will be using technologies encompassing front end development (such as native JavaScript, React and CSS), back end development (covering Java/Python services with SQL and NoSQL data stores) and much more to help us continue evolving our platforms. We are all about performance, scalability, security and wrapping it all in the best user experience our customers can imagine.
This spans wallet, top up, purchase, payment, shopping and more as you create readable, repeatable code and manage your codebase with pride to develop our platform and full service financial platform offering to build a digital life experience!




Your Skills and Experience


Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Math preferred.
Strong in client side frameworks such as React, Angular, Flux/Redux.
Expert in backend languages, such as Java, Python, and NodeJS.
Experience designing/developing APIs with OpenAPI/Swagger.
Experience with containerization and deployment in hybrid cloud (AWS/GCP) environments.
Strong Database skills in SQL and NoSQL solutions as well as strengths/weaknesses of both.
Excellent HTML/CSS skills having understanding of data organization and layout.
Experience with monolithic systems and strong understanding of macro/micro architectures.
Experience working with CI/CD platforms and an appreciation for the build process.   
You enjoy optimizing everything from how your code is compiled to how it scales across servers.
You thrive on learning new technologies and methods and want to use the best tools available.
You test your code and build systems to automate for testing efficiency.




Why You'll Love Working Here


Office hours: Monday- Friday, off on Saturday and Sunday. Annual holidays leave will be following Vietnam law and as company regulations.
10 full paid sick leave days
Lunch allowance
Competitive remuneration package
Unlimited access to Udemy training course
13th salary + year end performance bonus
Social insurance, health insurance and unemployment insurance will be under Labor Law.
Healthcare insurance package (Bao Viet insurance)
Annual summer vacation, Team-building activities
Dynamic and youthful working environment
Professional development opportunities.
Cooperating with many domestic and multi-national partners.
Free English training course.
Technical training course.
Macbook is provided for work
Happy hour / week
Team building each quarter of year

title: Capacity Building Manager
company: Bài việt không đề cập tên Công ty
description:
VACANCY ANNOUNCEMENT
Position: Capacity Building ManagerReports to: Country DirectorLocation: Ha NoiTeam/Division: Capacity BuildingPosition Type: Full timeInternal liaison: WCS Viet Nam’s Head of Finance and Administration, Counter Wildlife Trafficking (CWT) Technical Manager, Grant Implementation Manager, Human Resource Officer, Combating Wildlife Trafficking Future Leaders Program (FLP) Regional Coordinator and/or Director for Asia Counter Wildlife Trafficking (CWT)Expected travel: Approximately 30%. As required within the country, occasionally to Asia if/when needed, and to donor/technical meetings as needed/possible)
Organization Background:
The Wildlife Conservation Society (WCS) is a US non-profit, tax-exempt, private organization established in 1895 that saves wildlife and wild places by understanding critical issues, crafting science-based solutions, and taking conservation actions that benefit nature and humanity. With more than a century of experience, long-term commitments in dozens of landscapes, presence in more than 60 nations, and experience helping to establish over 150 protected areas across the globe, WCS has amassed the biological knowledge, cultural understanding and partnerships to ensure that vibrant, wild places and wildlife thrive alongside local communities. Working with local communities and organizations, that knowledge is applied to address species, habitat and ecosystem management issues critical to improving the quality of life of poor rural people whose livelihoods depend on the direct utilization of natural resources.
WCS Viet Nam Program Overview:
WCS has been working in Viet Nam since early 2006 to strengthen the commitment and capacity of the Vietnamese government to combat wildlife trafficking. It has established a well-respected presence in the country, providing support to a range of government agencies. WCS Viet Nam have generated a wide range of reliable data on a number of related issues and trained about 1,200 law enforcement officers from a range of agencies in investigation and enforcement techniques, and distributed a number of technical handbooks and guides. It has assisted central agencies to review and propose criminal intelligence analysis systems, inter-agency agreements and cooperation, national legislation, and have supported bi-lateral dialogues to suppress the wildlife trade and strengthen Viet Nam’s enforcement response. Its wildlife health expertise has been leveraged in Viet Nam to address core conservation issues, like wildlife trade, through collaborative research, training, and policy development.
Job Summary:
Under the supervision of the Country Director, the Capacity Building Manager will work in close collaboration with the FLP Regional Coordinator. S/he is responsible for the implementation of capacity building program of WCS Viet Nam including CWT Future Leaders Program in Viet Nam, assists FLP Regional Coordinator in liaising with government counterparts and plays a significant role in executing all designed activities and ensuring the expected deliverables under this program in Viet Nam.
This Job Description is progressive in nature and shall be reviewed and amended from time to time to meet WCS Viet Nam program needs.
Responsibilities:
A. Capacity Building and CWT Future Leaders Programs

In coordination with the FLP Regional Coordinator, leads the implementation and monitoring of the CWT Future Leaders Program in Viet Nam;
Coordinates with and provide advocacy to educational institutions and relevant government agencies to secure agreement and to conduct planned activities;
Works with partners and delegates to monitor and evaluate the effectiveness and implementation of the program;
Works with Program staff in charge of capacity building to coordinate all relevant capacity building activities under WCS Viet Nam program;
Develops mechanisms and tools in assessing approaches of the CWT Future Leaders Program in Viet Nam;
Oversees the FLP program communication in line with WCS’s Communication Strategy
Manages the development of communication products under the FLP;
Oversees the management of the FLP program deliverables merged into WCS’s knowledge management for WCS staff to find and use the necessary data effectively and efficiently.
Documents lesson learnt and success factors for sharing internally with staff working on the same program in other country/ countries;

B. Networking and Partnership

Supports and maintains partnerships with key government agencies at central and provincial levels in Viet Nam, research/academic institutions, CSOs, NGOs and individuals relating to wildlife law enforcement.

C. Workplan and Budget Management

Contributes to work plans, quarterly reports and all other requested reports;
Contributes to performance reporting for law enforcement support activities in WCS Vietnam.

D. Fundraising

Provides inputs in proposal development including technical and financial ones;
Supports other fundraising activities, as requested.

E. Others

Contributes to the development of WCS Viet Nam policies and strategies;
Acts as WCS’s representative at the provincial and national level/meetings/workshops as required;
Supervises members of the Capacity Building team;
Performs other tasks as assigned by the direct supervisor.

Minimum Requirements:

5 years of relevant experience as project/programme officer at international NGOs;
Language: English and Vietnamese language is essential to effective performance in this position;
Fluency in Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint);
Knowledge of Viet Nam law enforcement systems;
Knowledge of Viet Nam education systems, especially for police force.

Required Competencies

Time management
Critical thinking, problem solving and resourcefulness
Task prioritization
Work well under pressure
Team building
Accountability
Result orientation
Data management & analysis

Application Process:
Interested candidates, who meet the above qualifications should apply by online via this link https://goo.gl/forms/50rGnmX765ezDyjH3 latest by 17:30 of January 31, 2019.
WCS is an equal opportunity employer and the organization complies with all employment and labor laws and regulations that prohibit discrimination in hiring and ensures that candidates from all backgrounds are fairly and consistently considered during the recruitment process. We are dedicated to hiring and supporting a diverse workforce. We are committed to cultivating an inclusive work environment and look for future team members who share that same value.
The organization provides equal employment opportunities for all qualified candidates. The organization does not discriminate for employment based on age, color, disability, gender identify, national origin, race, religion, sexual orientation, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by laws and regulations.
Please note that only short listed candidates will be contacted for interview.

Hanoi 
Application Deadline: 
Thu, 2019-01-31

title: IT Director
DevOps Engineer
company: Bài việt không đề cập tên Công ty
description:
Top 3 Reasons To Join Us


Cutting-edge expertise in Data Management domain
Professional and innovative working environment
Attractive salary with great benefits and reward





The Job


Build Management

Manage and coordinate Build and Release Management activities, release branches/streams, and merging.
Implement and manage continuous inspection of code quality to perform automatic reviews with static analysis of code to detect bugs, code smells, and security vulnerabilities.
Partner with software developers, testers, infrastructure teams, and product managers to ensure releases are delivered with a repeatable and auditable process.
Maintain, research and build the tools to validate quality (such as source code, documents, libraries, ...) and to integrate between management tools (such as Jira, Mantis...)

Bash script

- Chances to learn and up your level with professional training courses on new technology (Big data, AI, …) and R&D new product 
- Attractive salary according to experiences
- Bonus twice a year, salary review every year basing on performance
- Benefits including Health insurance from Liberty, lunch allowance, paid leaves, summer holidays and outing days
- Experienced, friendly team and supportive leaders that will help you best enhance your values
- High quality and elegant working office, provided with the most modern equipment

title: Giám Sát IT (IT Supervisor)
description:
Công ty: Khách sạn InterContinental Hà Nội
Địa điểm làm việc: Keangnam, Mễ Trì, Từ Liêm, Hà Nội

Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)Assist Manager to monitor the operation of all computer hardware, ensures all systems are working and installed properly and serves as the primary contact for servicing the computer hardware
Ensures that all systems are covered by the proper maintenance contracts and that preventive maintenance is performed as required
Maintain an up-to-date list of all computer hardware
Monitors the performance of the software and maintains a log book of performance report eg; through systems measurement facility/ utility, error and integrity check reports, system malfunction and solutions install and tests corporate approved program changes to the hotel computer system(s)
Understand all standard and IHG customized features and functions of the Hotel front olfice system, point of sale system, and call accounting system, including, but not limited to system security, system reports, manager functions, system utilities and user functions
Ensures that all computer media saves and back-ups are completed. documented and stored per IHG specifications
Maintains uncompromising data and physical security standards
Controls the key/lock for computer room and ensures that the computer room fire protection, temperature control, and power requirements meet the IHG security specification as described in the IHG security system
Under the direction of the Director/Manager of Finance and Business Support, administer all back office user lD’s,
passwords, security parameters and the most sensitive utility
Maintains technical and user documentation. systems reports. newsletters and announcements in a neat, orderly and secure
Chức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên
Hình thức làm việc: Làm theo giờ
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
Full salary and service charge in probation periodAttractive salary and insurance packageOpportunity to work with a great team of people and career growth in the world’s largest luxury hotel brandOpportunity to join international training and development programsDelicious and nutritious meal at Hotel’s Social CaféLaundered uniform provided by HotelPre-employment health check and annual health checkFree parkingRecognition program with valuable giftsSummer vacation and many team building activitiesHotel discounts worldwide at all IHG Hotels and ResortsFood & Beverage discount at HotelOther benefits according to Hotel’s policy
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học
Yêu cầu công việc:
Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or related field.
Experience
2 years related experience or an equivalent combination of education and work-related experience.
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Kỹ sư phần cứng,Quản trị hệ thống

title: Principal Mobile Engineer
company: CÔNG TY LIÊN DOANH VẬN CHUYỂN QUỐC TẾ HẢI VÂN
description:
Havaz là một sản phẩm công nghệ mới đột phá được thiết kế để thay đổi cách thức di chuyển của hành khách cũng như vận chuyển hàng hóa đường dài liên tỉnh. Bằng cách tạo ra một hệ sinh thái kết nối hành khách có nhu cầu di chuyển với các đơn vị vận tải, chúng tôi có thể tối ưu hóa cung đường di chuyển, rút ngắn thời gian di chuyển và thời gian chờ đợi. Được sự hậu thuẫn từ công ty mẹ Hải Vân là công ty vận tải hàng đầu Việt Nam với kinh nghiệm trên 20 năm hoạt động trong lĩnh vực vận tải, kết hợp với sự dẫn dắt của những founder nhiều kinh nghiệm chinh chiến startup công nghệ, Havaz đã và đang đạt được những bước phát triển vững chắc. Chúng tôi tự tin đang ở trên một đường đua khá tốt và một thị trường đầy tiềm năng bởi vậy chúng tôi mong muốn tìm kiếm những người đồng hành mới để chinh phục các thử thách phía trước. 
Một số điều bạn cần biết về Havaz:
Sản phẩm của chúng tôi phục vụ người dân Việt Nam, khách hàng của chúng tôi chính là bạn và những người như bạn có nhu cầu di chuyển từ A đến B. Tuy nhiên mục tiêu của chúng tôi luôn là xây dựng một cái gì đó cho thị trường khu vực Đông Nam Á và Châu Á.
Havaz là một công ty sản phẩm, không phải là một công ty gia công. Điều đó có nghĩa là chúng ta không phải lúc nào cũng có một danh sách hoàn hảo các yêu cầu để biết chính xác phải làm gì tiếp theo và chúng ta cần phải làm việc cùng nhau để tìm ra nó.
Havaz là một công ty sản phẩm. Thiết kế rất quan trọng, đó là một cái gì đó cần phải có ngay từ ngày đầu, không phải thứ bạn cố gắng thêm vào sau ba hoặc bốn năm. Trải nghiệm người dùng rất quan trọng. Làm một sản phẩm để khách hàng thực sự thích sử dụng là rất quan trọng. Đặt khách hàng làm trung tâm là con đường Havaz theo đuổi
Mô tả công việc
Là một Kỹ sư cấp cao thành viên của core team, người có tài năng giải quyết các vấn đề kiến trúc và kỹ thuật phức tạp, bạn sẽ giúp chúng tôi định hình kiến ​​trúc của hệ thống. Khi làm như vậy, bạn sẽ phải đối mặt với rất nhiều thách thức mà bạn có thể không có cơ hội đối mặt ở bất kỳ công ty nào khác.
Bạn là người kỹ tính, cẩn thận và để ý chi tiết, xem xét các vấn đề từ các hướng khác nhau để đưa ra các giải pháp kỹ thuật tốt nhất. Là một Kỹ sư cấp cao, bạn không gặp vấn đề gì trong việc hướng dẫn và tư vấn cho các cộng sự cấp dưới để họ hoàn thành công việc tốt nhất.
Bạn có tư duy và kỹ năng của một hacker. Luôn tìm tòi, hack mọi thứ ở các khía cạnh khác nhau để tìm ra giải pháp độc đáo cho những vấn đề học búa
 

7+ years of experience in software engineering, building and hacking thing
Having a hacker mindset and philosophy http://paulgraham.com/gh.html
You have a track record of building and deploying complex software
You can adapt to different programming languages and technologies.
You have made tough technical decisions based on requirements, trade-offs, and user experience.
You enjoy building and growing strong A-player team
You are comfortable with a lot of autonomy.
Background in Distributed systems, Data Science or AI is a plus
Enforce engineering best practices
Implement CD/CI, TDD, end-to-end test architecture
Core Technologies Used
Very strong in at least one or several of these core tech:
Node.js, Golang, Laravel, Erlang, Python, C/C++
React.js, Vue.js, React Native, Swift/ObjectiveC, Kotlin/Java
Kubernetes, Kafka, Spark, Elasticsearch, Message Broker (NATS, RabbitMQ, MQTT…) 
High performance messaging using Protobuf
AWS services (EC2, S3, Lamda, SQS...), Google Cloud Services, Firebase
The best would be 7+ years of professional experience, a big plus if you've lead a team or created a great product. We welcome strong candidate having fewer years of experience as well, please tell us why "year" doesn't matter to you in the application letter. We have a hacker culture and mindset which value intellectual challenge of creatively overcoming limitations of software systems to achieve novel and clever outcomes http://paulgraham.com/gh.html.
Have a very strong technical skill, as a high ranking Principal Engineer/Hacker, member of the Core Team, we do expect any team members to be very strong in one of these core tech: React.js, React Native, Node.js, Golang, Laravel, Erlang, Python, C/C++. You may breathe React and NodeJs ecosystem but you can switch to Python or Golang easily. You can adapt easily and comfortable working on new technology when required because new technology or language are just one of many tools in your tool set. You are open mind self motivation and constantly learning new technology. You know exactly what you are talking about and people 100% trust you on your talk.
Have a strong architecture skill, stands on your own, makes and protects your own architecture decisions.
Have an open mind, can-but-not-blindly-do attitude. You have "can-do" attitude, which is already very cool, but you also must be able to pause and ask "should we do it"
Understand the balance between technical and business decisions
Understand the value of writing test
Be on your own, dedicated and committed, we strongly believe in autonomous, there's likely no one to tell you what to do
And be a TEAM PLAYER, because we can move nowhere without a team
Must be able to say "I was wrong", because no one is perfect
And last but not least: Always treat people with respect
