title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description:
As a Business intelligence analyst in PMAX, you will use data to understand where the company stands to increase profitability and productivity.Job Description:
Collect, manipulate, and analyze data from all department.
Supporting peers and stakeholders as a Subject Matter Expert (SME) to manage their performance through reporting.
Design and produce reports on department or company level
Perform analysis on monthly/quarterly/yearly basis
Implement a standard reporting process in the company, develop standards for the best practice for reporting, and educate the company on available reporting tools
Benefits:
As you will work with all the department, you will understand about all the kpis that matters and you will uncover the insight across all department in the company.
This is a rare and exciting opportunity to work directly with the BoD.
With us you will find an exciting blend of a vibrant startup environment and professional operations. Many of our employees have backgrounds as successful corporate executives and management consultant, with strong entrepreneurial spirit

title: Business Analyst
description:
Asian Techは、世界に誇れるクオリティをアジアのみならず世界に！というミッションのもと、とてつもないスピードで成長しております。
創業2年で、社員数200人を超える拠点になりました！
ただこのスピード感、規模感で成長している拠点であるからこそ、組織の基盤が大変重要になってきています。
そこで、自らの開発経験を生かし、会社の基盤づくり組織づくりといったコアな部分に積極的に取り組んでいただくのが主なミッションです！
 

こんな方を求めています！>- 成長意欲が強く、他人の指示を待たず自分から物事に取り組める方- ベンチャーで、スピード感のある現場で裁量権を持って仕事ができる方 - ベトナム人を含めたチームメンバーと協調性を持ちながらリーダーシップを発揮できる方  - 大手企業の開発案件に携わった実績を積みたい方  - プログラミングやアプリ開発などを学びたい方
ベトナム・ダナンでの勤務となるため、以下を最低限の条件としています。  - 英語能力（TOEIC 750点以上レベル）  ※海外での留学経験、実務経験があれば、尚可  - 新興国で生活するバイタリティー
歓迎スキル- PHP /RubyonRailsでの開発実務経験- プロジェクトマネージャー/ディレクターとしてのプロダクト開発経験
 

 Độ tuổi: 
 Không giới hạn tuổi
 
 Hình thức: Nhân viên chính thức 
 Phúc lợi: - 13th month pay.
- Yearly profit bonus.
- Salary adjustment 2 times a year.
- Monthly team-building fund (200k/person/month).
- English/Japanese certificate incentive bonus program.
- Yearly company trip.
- Yearly health check at one of the top hospital in Danang.
- Bao Viet Healthcare insurance.



Here at Asian Tech, we've been recoding history since 2014. With our present focus on the Japanese market, we have gained a high standard quality for software development service for Web and Mobile applications. Our mission is to learn, develop and obtain the highest standards for global software services.Our young, dynamic and self-motivated employees are a truly international bunch from a wide variety of backgrounds, with a mix of Vietnamese, English and Japanese (to name but a few of the languages) flying about our office. Employees also have the opportunity to work with foreign managers with international experience as well as learn directly from our CEO, who lived and worked in Japan for 12 years. We are all united by the same vision that Asian Tech could be the leading innovative software service company in Asia (and the world!).Our headquarters is based in Da Nang city, with the search of clear blue skies and beautiful beaches to fuel our innovative thinking. We’ve also been looking for expanding our name to the European and American markets in the near future. No matter where we go, though, we'll always be striving for success.Thu gọn

title: Business Analyst
company: Bài việt không đề cập tên Công ty
description:
Description



 Business Analyst (BA) works with Focus Groups and with members of the development team carry out research on the market to come up with high level and detail requirements for the product. BA is responsible for understanding the business need, capturing the domain expertise that the potential client has, and translating this accurately into a succinct requirements document that will serve as the input to the software designers. 
 




Skills



 • Assess the client's business needs and business processes (current and future)
• Interview the domain experts in the focus group to capture all relevant domain knowledge
• Document the product’s vision and the project’s scope
• Document the business requirements in detail, (requirement specifications) with all assumptions and caveats included
• Define quality attributes, external interfaces, constraints, and other nonfunctional requirements
• Perform requirements analysis and verification, ensuring that requirement statements are complete, consistent, concise, comprehensible, traceable, feasible, unambiguous, and verifiable, and that they conform to standards
• Participate in peer reviews and inspections of requirements documents. Participate in peer reviews of work products derived from requirements specifications to ensure that the requirements were interpreted correctly
• Serve as an internal point of contact for development whenever requirements need to be clarified
• Establish and implement effective requirements practices, including use and continuous improvement of a requirements process. Assist with the development of the organization’s requirements engineering policies, procedures, and tools
• Take responsibility for establishing, implementing, maintaining and improving the process compliance of each corresponding department
Requirements
• At least 2 years’ experience in BA role with in-depth knowledge of management application 
• Knowledge of software development process, especially software requirement analysis and RUP
• Good command of English communications skills (speaking, reading and writing)
• Good listening and interviewing skills to understand a customer’s business environment and processes
• Proven ability to document business requirements in an accurate, unambiguous and succinct fashion
• Exceptional presentation and client relation skills
• Excellent organizational, analytical, as well as oral and written communication skills
• Aptitude to learn and understand new and emerging technologies
• Ability to work with minimal direction on multiple projects
• Thorough, paying attention to details





Diplomas



 • Holder of a BS. Degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline
• MBA or MSC in Software Engineering is highly desirable

title: Project Manager & Business Analyst
description:
Mô Tả Công Việc

 Project Managers have goals and activities expected of them grouped under 4 specific Responsibilities as detailed below:
** People Management
The following are a Project Manager’s key activities to ensure they meet their people management goals:
• Regular one-on-one’s with their team
• Creation and management of development plans for their team
• Address performance issues early with their team, setting clear expectations and holding their team to those expectations, and developing plans to address any performance gaps in their team
• Monitor and make team individuals accountable for responsibilities of their role
• Address resourcing gaps or vacancies promptly
** Project & Technology Leadership
• Project planning, build and manage a schedule to ensure work is identified, assigned and completed on time
• Responsible for closely working with customers/ product owner to clarify, analyze the business requirement
• Provides oversight into the analysis of business requirements and ensures that the information solutions address complex business needs
• Work closely with both software team and customers to make sure the fully understanding business requirements and proper feedback of two sides.
• Manage customer’s requests, analyze changes and follow process of changing requests
• In charge of documents writing of User Requirement Specification and Feature List
• Work towards and continuously improve the development standards and guidelines in conjunction with the Technical Lead
• Ensure the development delivery processes are being applied for all development activities, project and maintenance/enhancement
• Ensure quality software is delivered by themselves and their teams, with minimal defects and no go live critical issues
• Manage and maintain stable operational environments for their clients, and incidents are managed according to operational processes
** Teamwork and Collaboration
• Ownership and timely delivery of assigned tasks
• Identification of excess capacity and sharing of excess resource or specialist knowledge across the broader team
• Timely and proactive response to requests for service from all areas of the business
• Consistent and continual update of time-sheeting/time-logging system to ensure time logs are up to date daily
• Communicate directly with the Delivery Software Team to ensure they are fully informed of project status at all times
• In conjunction with the Technical Lead, ensure team deliver and foster quality software and solutions, in particular delivery of code that is: Robust, Efficient, Source Controlled, Scalable, Secure and Documented
• Identify and remove obstacles to achieving project efficiency
• Share knowledge and insights in a systematic way and encourage others to do the same
• In conjunction with the Technical Lead, address the source of errors, issues or problems until they are resolved
** Quality and Continuous Improvement
• Possess and exercise “an eye for detail” to ensure that code delivery passes creative QA.
• Ensure regular code reviews are being conducted
 
 Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
 

Yêu Cầu Công Việc

 ** Requirement
• At least 5 years experience as the Project manager and Business Analyst
• Experience in managing a team
• Strict dedication to delivering projects within deadlines while adhering to established quality and documentation standards
• A good team player with excellent communication and interpersonal skills
• Good spoken English is a requirement.** Why You’ll Love Working Here
• International, dynamic, friendly working environment.
• Clear and stable career growth
• Many opportunities for personal and professional growth.
• Regular team building events, sport activities…
• Medical and Accident Insurance program
• Professional training
• Competitive and attractive salary
 

 Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc

title: Nhân Viên  Phân Tích Kinh Doanh (Business Analyst)
company: Công ty TNHH bbv Việt Nam
description:
Công ty: Công ty TNHH bbv Việt Nam
Địa điểm làm việc: Hồ Chí Minh

Mô tả công việc: (Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)You will work as a Business Analyst in an Agile environment.- Envision initial requirements and support creating initial project scope. - Participate in product prototyping, mock-up, and GUI design. - Gather, analyze, and translate business needs into user stories and acceptance criteria. - Validate and verify implemented user stories based on acceptance criteria. - Support the creation and maintenance of project documentation. - Support the estimation of new projects. - Keep up to date with new trends and best practices in business analysis and share knowledge with colleagues
Chức vụ: Nhân viên/Chuyên viên
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
- Friendly working environment. - English speaking environment. - Truly Agile software development. - Working with top talents from Switzerland, Germany, Greece, and Vietnam. - We support English classes at top English centers in Ho Chi Minh. - We support sports clubs, parking fee, free coffee, snacks, and lunch. - Working with the latest technologies (microservices, CI/CD, the latest version of Java, .NET, Angular…). - Working with different business domains such as e-commerce, automotive, logistics, insurance, healthcare. - Participating in the complete software development lifecycle and help to make visions work - Exchanging knowledge with 20 internal communities (Web/Front-end, Java, .NET, Cloud Computing, Mobile Development, IoT, Cryptocurrencies). - Annual company trip and team building activities. - Year-end party and project team dinners. - Gifts on Christmas and Tet.
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học
Yêu cầu công việc:
1. Must have: - Bachelor's degree or equivalent with focus on computer science, information technology, systems development or a related field. - Have at least 3 years of experience as a business analyst. - In-depth experience with at least one prototyping tool (e.g.: Balsamiq, Axure RP, MS Visio…) - Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, PowerPoint, and Word). - Have good presentation skills. - Have a keen attention to detail. - Fluent in English (equivalent to IELTS 6+, TOEFL iBT 60+, TOEIC 750+) - Able to adjust your working time according to the project schedule. 
2. Nice to have:- Have a good knowledge of business analysis based on professional guides or have professional BA certificate (e.g.: IIBA ECBA, IIBA Agile Analysis Certification, or PMI PBA). - Experience with large-scale web applications (e.g.: e-Commerce, ERP, SaaS web app…). - Experience with UML and UML tool. - Experience with non-functional aspects, i.e. security, performance, and scalability. - Can speak German. 
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Quản lý sản phẩm,QA/Test

title: Business analyst & Trade markteting supervisor

description:

- Hỗ trợ cho hệ thống bán hàng, lên các chương trình hỗ trợ thương mại (HTTM) ngắn hạn và dài hạn nhằm thúc đẩy tiêu thụ ở các kênh của ngành hàng/ khu vực phụ trách
- Hỗ trợ các trưởng phòng Tiếp thị thương mại xây dựng các chương trình theo ngành hàng
- Lên kế hoạch phân bổ chỉ tiêu khuyến mãi cho từng NPP để đảm bảo tính hiệu quả của các chương trình khuyến mãi cho điểm lẻ
- Tạo ra các mẫu biểu để kiểm soát và đánh giá hiệu quả việc thực hiện các chương trình khuyến mãi cho các điểm bán sĩ và lẻ
- Giám sát các chương trình tại điểm bán, theo dõi, đánh giá các chỉ số liên quan, báo cáo định kỳ
- Làm các bài tóm tắt về sales và việc liên quan trình ký các chương trình của trade. Thực hiện các công việc khác (Theo yêu cầu)
2. Report business analyst (tỷ trọng 20%)
- Báo cáo phân tích dữ liệu bán hàng theo Form mẫu:
o Báo cáo sell in, sell out
o Báo cáo phân tích ngành hàng
o Tổng hợp báo cáo thị trường từ sales team gởi về
o Báo cáo đánh giá năng lực sales
o Báo cáo CTKM, sampling, activation…
3. Data (tỷ trọng 10%)
- Hiểu biết cơ bản excel và sử dụng các hàm lồng ghép để xử lý dữ liệu kinh doanh
- Theo dõi, kiễm tra, đối chiếu, làm sạch và cung cấp số liệu chuẩn xác trước khi gởi báo cáo cho cấp trên
- Theo dõi và cập nhật kết quả hàng ngày của sales team và thúc đẩy đội ngủ bán hàng thực hiện theo chỉ tiêu đã dồng thuận.
Ưu tiên am hiểu việc vận hành hệ thống DMS và excel nâng cao

-       Có kinh nghiệm làm việc có liên quan đến công việc hiện tại: phân tích kinh doanh, hoạt động tiếp thị thương mại, hỗ trợ bán hàng, đã từng đảm trách công việc tương tự trong ngành tiêu dùng nhanh/bán lẻ (FMCG) / hàng tươi sống.

-       Liên tục nâng cao khả năng thực hiện công việc, không ngừng học hỏi từ các đánh giá, phản hồi của cấp quản lý

-  Đọc hiểu các bảng phân tích, báo cáo số liệu kinh doanh.

Công ty Cổ phần Ba Huân là một trong những nhà cung cấp trứng sạch hàng đầu tại Việt Nam. Với vốn đầu tư hơn 30 tỉ đồng cho hệ thống xử lý và làm sạch trứng gia cầm bằng công nghệ hàng đầu Châu Âu, sản phẩm trứng sạch từ công ty Cổ phần Ba Huân bảo đảm vệ sinh an toàn thực phẩm dẫn đến an tâm về sức khỏe khách hàng.
Sản phẩm trứng sạch của Ba Huân gồm có:

Trứng vịt sạch, trứng gà sạch.
Trứng vịt muối, trứng bắc thảo.
Trứng vịt lộn, trứng cút tươi.

Trứng sạch Ba Huân được phân phối rộng rãi trong các hệ thống Metro, Coopmart, Vissan. Hệ thống các siêu thị từ TP Hồ Chí Minh đến các tỉnh Đông, Tây Nam Bộ. Nhà máy xử lý và làm sạch trứng gia cầm cùng hệ thống nhà kho được xây dựng trên diện tích hơn 12000m2.Thu gọn

title: Business Intelligence Analyst
description:
FUNCTIONAL BUSINESS OBJECTIVEs (FBOs):
The Business Intelligence Analyst is a central piece in CMG’s Agency service, providing insights on market, business and spending performance with the aim to increase efficiency and profits. Abiding to a high-performance culture and focusing on great execution towards clear revenue generation, he/she contributes to the company’s top and bottom line by:
· Working with Marketing Strategy & Account Management to identify business performance measurement requirements / metrics and translate these into meaningful business analytics;
· Consolidating all relevant (online & offline) data points including sales, customer behavior and marketing spending. Analyzing findings and recommending solutions to stakeholders;
· Working with Account Management & Marketing Strategy to develop valuable reporting and dashboards for the purpose of performance tracking. Provide assistance in weekly / monthly Client and stakeholder reporting;
· Own the tracking and performance measurement of CRM programs.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES & CRITICAL DRIVERS:
A. First 3 Months Focus - Implement Business Intelligence Infrastructure
1) Work with Marketing Strategy to create processes and workflows for interaction with other stakeholders.
2) Research and recommend appropriate tools for Business Intelligence that works well with existing tools.
3) Lead the implementation of BI tools, the creation of relevant reports and dashboards.
B. 60% - Developing Reporting & Generating Insights
1) Coordinate with Marketing Strategy & Account Management to crystalize different projects’ performance measurements and necessary reporting schedule and outline.
2) Developing daily performance reporting to provide all Marketing Stakeholders with the required visibility; ensure the consistency, accuracy and timely issuance of data / reports generated.
3) Work with Marketing Strategy to map Client’s competitor off and online strategies, including campaigns, communications or new product / pricing offering.
4) Deliver ad-hoc reporting or data slices when and where necessary upon request from agency stakeholders.
5) Work with Marketing Strategy to find trends and provide improvement recommendations based on data generated. Submit findings to relevant stakeholders in an actionable format.
6) Maintain performance and operational readiness of all tools employed to generate data / insights; work with different stakeholders to troubleshoot any existing issues.
C. 30% - Leading CRM Projects
1) Work with Marketing Strategy and any necessary outsourced service to design and implement different CRM programs within a timeline and budget.
2) Ensure the consistency of data gathered by working with relevant stakeholders for improved data inputs.
3) Measure performance and efficiency of the programs implemented and generate suggestions for targeting, cost and impact improvement.
4) Project manage improvements projects and generate reporting on the performance and project evolution to all relevant stakeholders.
D. 10% - Building Team & Culture
1) Recruitment: Define org structure, identify gaps and recruit ‘A Players’ capable of adding further to the team.
2) Training & Development: regularly hold sessions to share insights with different stakeholders and gather information from the same. Continuously monitor competition. Keep developing knowledge on new BI tools.
3) Succession Planning: Ensure an effective succession plan is in place to accommodate the growth of the team. Work with the management team to keep the succession plans current.
 
- University Degree preferably in a relevant degree such as business, management, accounting, economics, statistics, information science, engineering or similar.
- Minimum of 3+ years’ experience in a directly relevant role, with demonstrated success shown
- Strong commercial sense, with proven ability to create insights and actions from complex datasets.
- Advanced knowledge of Excel and other statistical tools.
- Have knowledge in SQL and Macro
- Hands on experience of data analytics tools, both online and offline.
- Good communication and reporting skills. Ability to take complex ideas into actionable and digestible insights.
- Results driven character. Process focused with a tireless focus on output quality.

title: Digital Business Process Analyst
description:
Objective
The Digital Banking Business Analyst provides consultation and assistance to various business units with the design, development and implementation of technical system projects including new products, services, and system enhancements. Works closely with business partners to identify and maximize opportunities to use information and technology to improve products, services and/or business processes. Assists/manage the implementation of reasonably extensive technical projectKey responsibilities
• Support/manage key projects/digital initiatives and deliver positive outcomes in line with business deadlines
• Provide direction for insights gained from Data interrogation through multiple sources
• Work as problem solver for key initiatives across multiple business areas to deliver digital projects
• Managing process change
• Colleting business requirements for IT projects
• Cooperating with IT on solution design
• Supporting acceptance testing 
• Applying their knowledge of business process modelling notations (BPMN, EPC, BPEL…) to document processes.
• Review, analyze, and create detailed documentation of business unit needs
